about_the_game:
Story
In Two World Portal, you enter a realm where time bends and ancient secrets lie buried. For centuries, the ancient portal—the only link between our world and a mysterious, untouched realm—has remained inactive, sealed with lost crystals scattered across the globe. As a descendant of the guardians of this portal, you are tasked with reuniting these crystals to restore the portal's power.
Your quest begins when an ancient manuscript surfaces, revealing the locations of these mystical crystals. Venture through deserted ruins, mysterious rooms, old houses, and vast ancient jungles. Uncover the stories of civilizations long gone and their hidden treasures. Along the way, allies will aid you, sharing their wisdom and resources, while rivals seek to thwart your efforts, driven by their own agendas.
Embark on this journey not just for adventure, but to bridge the gap between two worlds, revealing the true power of the ancient portal and the secrets it holds.



Gameplay
Two World Portal is an adventure puzzle game that tests your wits and courage across two mysterious worlds. Featuring a variety of puzzles, from simple hidden object searches to complex symbol decoding’s and intricate riddles, each challenge brings you closer to unlocking the ancient portal.
Navigate through beautifully rendered landscapes filled with interactive elements and hidden secrets. The gameplay is designed to gradually increase in difficulty, ensuring a satisfying progression that will keep players engaged from start to finish. Utilize tools and clues found in the environment to solve puzzles and unlock new areas in both worlds.
